subclassFeature.name: Circle of the Rainbow
entries: Druids of the Circle of the Rainbow exalt their namesake as the pinnacle of nature's beauty. Wielding similarly scintillating abilities, many of these druids try to inspire others to reverence, both for the luminescent miracles they worship and for the natural world as a whole.

subclassFeature.name: Circle Spells
entries: The wondrous light of the rainbow suffuses your magic. You learn the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip.

When you reach certain Druid levels, you gain access to the spells in the table below. They count as Druid spells for you, and you always have them prepared, but they don't count against the total number of spells you prepare each day.
Additionally, when you cast {@spell color spray}, you can modify it to affect all creatures in the area that fail a Constitution saving throw instead of using its original method.

subclassFeature.name: Mantle of Many Colours
entries: As a bonus action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape feature to weave a mantle of ever-shifting hues around yourself and roll on the Prismatic Boons table. This table determines the colour of your mantle and its effect, which occurs immediately after the roll once.
The mantle is always under the effect of the {@spell light} cantrip and vanishes after 1 minute. While wearing it, you can use your bonus action on subsequent turns to roll on this table again.

entries.caption: Prismatic Boons
rows: You choose a creature within 30 feet of you to gain the effects of {@spell divine favor} until the start of your next turn.
You cast {@spell bane} without concentration. The spell lasts until the end of your next turn and counts as a Druid spell for you.
You choose a creature within 30 feet of you to gain the effects of {@spell zephyr strike|xge} until the end of its next turn.
Each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Up to three creatures of your choice within 30 feet of you gain the effects of {@spell bless} until the end of your next turn.
You choose creatures up to your proficiency bonus within 30 feet of you to gain a +1 bonus to AC for 1 round.
You cast {@spell sanctuary}. The spell lasts until the end of your next turn and counts as a Druid spell for you.
You teleport with a rainbow-producing {@spell misty step} and apply another boon of your choice from the above seven.

subclassFeature.name: Dazzling Iridescence
entries: Kaleidoscopic light dances at your fingertips, letting you cast {@spell color spray} as a reaction before a creature attacks or casts a spell, and increase the size of the spell's cone by 10 feet for each slot level above 1st you use to cast it.
You can also cast {@spell color spray} without expending a spell slot twice, regaining all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Full Spectrum
entries: Your mantle shimmers with boundless potential. While wearing it, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can hover, along with the option to reroll your Prismatic Boons, picking from either result.

subclassFeature.name: Catch the Rainbow
entries: The essence of the seven colours shines within you. You add {@spell prismatic spray} to your list of Circle Spells, and can cast it without expending a spell slot once per day.
Any rays the spell creates can be replaced with a ray of the same colour as your last Prismatic Boon.
